summary: Former college frenemies Lauren and Katie move into a fabulous Gramercy Park apartment, and in order to make ends meet, the unlikely pair start a phone sex line together.
cast: Lauren Miller Rogen|James Wolk|Ari Graynor|Justin Long|Lawrence A. Mandley|Eddie Geller|Josh Ruben|Steven Shaw|Mimi Rogers|Don McManus|Mark Webber|Nia Vardalos|Kevin Smith|Sugar Lyn Beard|Seth Rogen|Ken Marino|Martha MacIsaac|The Legend of Zelda Miller-Rogen|Vanessa Britting|Kimberly Cossette|Veronika Dash|Jennie Floyd|Sherilyn Henderson|David Kallaway|Amanda Marlon|Michael Medico|Krystina Ptasinski|Amy Jo Steele|Paula Vanessa
title: Para pasar un buen rato, llama...
